00001 #ifndef _NESTEDSAMPLING_
00002 
00003 // C++ stdlib
00004 #include <iostream>
00005 #include <vector>
00006 #include "math.h"
00007 
00008 // ROOT Libraries
00009 #include "TRandom3.h"
00010 
00011 // Local Libraries
00012 #include "probabilities.h"
00013 #include "baseNestedObject.h"
00014 #include "chainBundle.h"
00015 
00016 using namespace std;
00017 
00019 //            log( exp(a) + exp(b) )            //
00021 
00022 double logSumExp(double a, double b)
00023 {
00024 
00025     if(a > b) 
00026     {
00027         return a + log( 1.0 + exp(b - a) );
00028     }
00029     else
00030     {      
00031         return b + log( 1.0 + exp(a - b) );
00032     }
00033     
00034 }
00035 
00037 //     Sample from the posterior distribution   //
00038 //             with nested sampling             //
00040 
00041 double sample(chainBundle &bundle, TRandom3 &random)
00042 {
00043 
00044     // Sample from the posterior
00045     const unsigned int nIterations = 150;
00046     unsigned int nCompleteIterations = 0;
00047     //unsigned int nConNoInfo = 0;
00048     //unsigned int nMaxConNoInfo = 10;
00049 
00050     double nObjects = bundle.nChains();
00051     double nObjectsInverse = 1.0 / (double)nObjects;
00052     double logWidth = log(1.0 - exp(-nObjectsInverse) );
00053     double logZ = 0;
00054     double H = 0;
00055     double dH = 10;
00056     
00057     for(unsigned int n = 0; n < nIterations; ++n)
00058     {
00059     
00060         // Find sample with smallest posterior probability
00061         unsigned int minIndex = 0;
00062         double minLogL = bundle.chain(0)->logL(1);
00063         double maxLogL = minLogL;
00064         
00065         for(unsigned int i = 1; i < nObjects; ++i)
00066         {
00067         
00068             double testLogL = bundle.chain(i)->logL(1);
00069             
00070             if(testLogL < minLogL)
00071             {
00072                 minLogL = testLogL;
00073                 minIndex = i;
00074             }
00075             
00076             if(testLogL > maxLogL) maxLogL = testLogL;
00077                 
00078         }
00079         
00080         baseNestedObject* minObject = bundle.chain(minIndex);
00081         double logL = minLogL;
00082         double logWeight = logWidth + logL;
00083         double logZnew = 0;
00084         
00085         // Update evidence and information
00086         if(!n) 
00087         {
00088             logZ = logWeight;
00089             H = logL - logZ;
00090         }
00091         else   
00092         {
00093             logZnew = logSumExp(logZ, logWeight);
00094             dH = -H;
00095             H = exp(logWeight - logZnew) * logL + exp(logZ - logZnew) * (H + logZ) - logZnew;
00096             logZ = logZnew;
00097             dH += H;
00098         }
00099         
00100         double x = bundle.chain(minIndex)->x()[0];
00101         if(n % 10 == 0) cout << "Iteration " << n << ", mu = " << 1.0 / (1.0 + exp(-x)) << ", logL bound = " << minLogL << ", H = " << H << endl;
00102         
00103         /*
00104         // Break if the information has saturated
00105         if(fabs(dH) / H < 1e-5)
00106         {
00107             ++nConNoInfo;
00108         }
00109         else
00110         {
00111             nConNoInfo = 0;
00112         }
00113         
00114         if(nConNoInfo >= nMaxConNoInfo)
00115         {
00116             cout << "sample() - Sampling finished early after " << nCompleteIterations << " iterations" << endl;
00117             break;
00118         }
00119         */
00120         
00121         // Break if Skilling criteria is satisfied
00122         if( exp(maxLogL + logWidth - logZ) < 0.001 )
00123         {
00124             cout << "sample() - Sampling finished early after " << nCompleteIterations << " iterations" << endl;
00125             break;
00126         }
00127         
00128         // Randomly select a new seed from the current samples
00129         unsigned int seed = minIndex;
00130         while(seed == minIndex) seed = floor(nObjects * random.Rndm());
00131         minObject->storeMinLogL();
00132         
00133         // Select new sample
00134         while(1)
00135         {
00136         
00137             *minObject = *(bundle.chain(seed));
00138             bundle.sampleWithConstraint(minObject);
00139             
00140             // Test likelihood bound, breaking loop if new draw is good
00141             double testLogL = minObject->logL();
00142             
00143             if(testLogL > logL) break;
00144         
00145         }
00146         
00147         // Shrink sample width
00148         logWidth -= nObjectsInverse;
00149         
00150         ++nCompleteIterations;
00151         
00152     }
00153     
00154     if(nCompleteIterations == nIterations) cout << "sample() - Finishing nested sampling with" << endl;
00155     cout << "sample() -\t logZ = " << logZ << " +/- " << sqrt(H * nObjectsInverse) << endl;
00156     cout << "sample() -\t H = " << H << endl;
00157     cout << endl;
00158 
00159     return logZ;
00160     
00161 }
00162

00164 #endif
